data.name: Sherwood Extreme
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game



Sherwood Extreme is a FREE outrageous arcade shooter where you save the kingdom by sniping in style, solo or with friends! Wishlist today!

Race to the finish through beautiful low-poly environments. Zip, swing, and soar through the air in slow-motion to rack up combos with all the 360 no-scopes and parkour action medieval times were known for.

KEY FEATURES

  • Swing, Flip, Kaboom! - Use zip-lines, swinging ropes, bouncy mushrooms, and cannons to move through the air at top speeds, exploding and sniping every goblin you come across.
  • Team Up in Co-Op - Work with friends to complete challenges and top the leaderboards. Master thousands of level variants with speed and precision to achieve global recognition!
  • Upgrade Your Hero - Level up and collect shinies to unlock weapons, skills, and outfits. Execute your playstyle and make bold fashion statements on the battlefield!
  • Laugh in Danger's Face - Discover silly secrets throughout Sherwood kingdom and earn higher scores by destroying goblins in the most ridiculous ways!

data.short_description: Flip, swing, and slow-motion dive as Robin Hood: master of parkour and archery! Snipe wacky foes and bullet-time your way through the kingdom. Speedrun thousands of level variants and chase leaderboard glory, solo or with friends.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX Sierra
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OSX Big Sur
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
